name: peak-1031-v1
description: Peak 1031 V1 Platform - Complete 1031 Exchange Management System

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run docker:up && sleep 30 && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed

author: Peak 1031 Team
